Some Lesser Known Facts About Mohit Sehgal

He learnt acting skills from Barry John’s acting studio.

Mohit has acted in various Hindi TV serials like ‘Saath Nibhaana Saathiya’ (2011), ‘Parichay-Nayee Zindagi Kay Sapno Ka’ (2012), ‘Qubool Hai’ (2013), ‘Sarojini – Ek Nayi Pehal’ (2015), and ‘Naagin 5’ (2020).

He has appeared as a guest in many Hindi TV serials such as ‘Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi’ (2008), ‘Doli Armaano Ki’ (2013), ‘Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 8’ (2015), ‘Yeh Hai Mohabbatein’ (2018), and ‘Nach Baliye 9’ (2019).

In 2010, he hosted two reality TV shows i.e. ‘Zara Nachke Dikha’ and ‘Meethi Choori No 1.’

As a contestant, he has appeared in a few Hindi reality TV shows like ‘Killerr Karaoke Atka Toh Latkah’ (2015), ‘Box Cricket League 2’ (2016), and ‘Nach Baliye 8’ (2017).

In 2021, he acted in the Hindi film ‘Badnaam.’

He once shared that he had a habit of taking long to get ready.

He is an avid animal lover and owns a pet cat named Pupshi Cola.

He is often spotted consuming wine at various parties and events.

Mohit is a religious person and has a deep faith in god.

He loves to play various sports like table tennis.

He regularly works out at a gym to remain fit.
